verbose_text: Nodal signaling, which is mediated by Smad2, is active in the first five or six cell tiers of the margin in the blastula embryo, whereas FGF activity extends further, leading to the idea that cells closest to the margin become endoderm due to high levels of Nodal signaling, whereas endoderm fate is repressed by FGF further from the margin.
evidence: Nodal signaling, which is mediated by Smad2
